title: x/tools/cmd/vet: allow individual errors to be ignored/suppressed via code comments
body:
"go vet" sometimes reports false positives. It would be nice if code could be annotated with something like "// vet:ignore" to make it so "go vet" does not report errors associated with that line of code, perhaps for a particular specified error type.

(I searched to see if this option exists, but couldn't find anything.)
